snippet: Formula One, the auto-racing business, may put off its planned initial public offering until later this year because of time pressures and a volatile equity market.
abstract: Formula One, the auto-racing business, may put off its planned initial public offering until later in 2012 because of time pressures and a volatile equity market.
lead_paragraph: Formula One, the auto-racing business, may put off its planned initial public offering until later this year because of time pressures and a volatile equity market.

headline.main: Formula One’s I.P.O. May Be Delayed
